titles.title: Child Care Tax Credit Reform Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the child care credit for lower-income working parents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Child Care Tax Credit Reform Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of employment-related expenses subject to the dependent care income tax credit. Denies the credit to taxpayers having adjusted gross income of $50,000 or more.
